mapper.select: select user_id, username, name from users limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
mapper.insert: insert into users(username,name,password,email) values(#{username},#{name},#{password},#{email}); insert into group_members(username, group_id) values(#{username}, 1)
mapper.update: update users set password=#{password} where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into contact_addresses(receiver, province, city, district, street, detail_address, phone, email, user) values(#{receiver}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{street}, #{detailAddress}, #{phone}, #{email,javaType=string,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select ca.id, ca.receiver, ca.province, p.name as provinceName, ca.city, c.name as cityName, ca.district, d.name as districtName, ca.street, s.name as streetName, ca.detail_address as detailAddress, ca.phone, ca.email, ca.is_default isDefault from contact_addresses ca join provinces p on ca.province = p.id join cities c on ca.city = c.id join districts d on ca.district = d.id join streets s on ca.street = s.id where user = #{userId}
